==Features==
==Features==
â
*'''Updated frequently''': ''Super Ubuntu'' is released every month, including new updates for the operating system and also for the additional software.<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/su "a new version is released every month." - Official website]</ref>
+
*'''Updated frequently''': ''Super Ubuntu'' is released about every month, including new updates for the operating system and also for the additional software.<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/su "a new version is released every month." - Official website]</ref>
*'''Multimedia support''': ''Super Ubuntu'' is prepackaged with support for MP3 files and [[DVD-Video|video-DVDs]] by default, it also includes additional codecs, and additional media players ([[VLC Media Player]] and [[MPlayer]])
*'''Multimedia support''': ''Super Ubuntu'' is prepackaged with support for MP3 files and [[DVD-Video|video-DVDs]] by default, it also includes additional codecs, and additional media players ([[VLC Media Player]] and [[MPlayer]])
â
*'''Support for Microsoft Office 2007 file formats''': ''Super Ubuntu'' includes [http://katana.oooninja.com/w/odf-converter-integrator odf-converter-integrator], which allows users to open files created with Microsoft Office 2007.
+
*'''Support for Microsoft Office 2007 file formats''' with [[OpenOffice.org]] 3.0
*'''Improved Internet Experience''': It includes an additional web browser ([[Opera (web browser)|Opera]]), [[Adobe Flash Player]], more communication software ([[aMSN]], [[Skype]] and [[Mozilla Thunderbird]]) and P2P software ([[aMule]])
*'''Improved Internet Experience''': It includes an additional web browser ([[Opera (web browser)|Opera]]), [[Adobe Flash Player]], more communication software ([[aMSN]], [[Skype]] and [[Mozilla Thunderbird]]) and P2P software ([[aMule]])
*'''Additional software''': It also includes [[Adobe Reader]], [[GParted]], [[Wine (software)|Wine]], the [[GUI for Uncomplicated Firewall]], and other software.
*'''Additional software''': It also includes [[Adobe Reader]], [[GParted]], [[Wine (software)|Wine]], the [[GUI for Uncomplicated Firewall]], and other software.
